body.subject: Epic 28 implementation complete - ready for final quality review
body.summary: Developer reports all 8 workstreams (18 tasks) completed for Epic 28. Implementation includes: Domain & Contracts (ws1), Memory Fabric (ws2), Intent Routing & Planner (ws3), 5 Skill Adapters (ws4), Consensus Bridge + Safety (ws5), Orchestrator (ws6), Presentation & Voice (ws7), Observability & QA (ws8). All test evidence provided: unit tests (>= 75-95%), integration tests, security tests (7/7 passing), performance tests (3/3 passing), smoke tests (5/5 skills). Code quality verified: Clean Architecture compliance, MyPy/lint pass. Ready for final quality review to lift veto and set release_gate: true.
key_points: All 8 workstreams completed: ws1-ws8 (18 tasks total)

Test evidence complete: Unit tests (>= 75-95% coverage), Integration tests (MongoDB, LLM, Prometheus), Security tests (input sanitization, 7/7 passing), Performance tests (memory < 150ms, intent < 5s, multi-step < 30s, 3/3 passing), Smoke tests (all 5 skills, 5/5 created)
Code quality: Clean Architecture compliance verified (no outer-to-inner layer imports), MyPy type checking passes, linting passes (pylint, black)
Metrics implemented: Prometheus metrics exported (god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds)
Security: Input sanitization for all entry points (Telegram messages, voice transcripts, CLI commands), no external SaaS dependencies verified
Performance: All targets met (memory retrieval < 150ms AC5, intent routing < 5s AC2, multi-step flows < 30s)
All acceptance criteria met: AC1-AC12 (verified by developer)
concerns: Quality engineer must verify: test_evidence completeness (coverage >= 80% for all layers), security tests passing, performance tests passing, layer boundary validation, all 12 AC met
After quality approval (release_gate: true), deployment can proceed per deployment.json
Implementation.json should be fully updated with all 18 tasks and complete test_evidence
body.action_needed: Conduct final quality review of Epic 28 implementation. Verify: all 18 tasks completed, test_evidence complete (coverage >= 80% for all layers), security tests passing (7/7), performance tests passing (3/3), smoke tests created (5/5), layer boundary validation, all 12 AC met. If all quality gates pass, set release_gate: true to lift veto and unblock deployment.
